availabilityZone.description: availabilityZone specifies the Cinder availability where the root volume will be created.

deviceType.description: Deprecated: deviceType will be silently ignored. There is no replacement.

diskSize.description: diskSize specifies the size, in GB, of the created root volume.

sourceType.description: Deprecated: sourceType will be silently ignored. There is no replacement.

sourceUUID.description: sourceUUID specifies the UUID of a glance image used to populate the root volume. Deprecated: set image in the platform spec instead. This will be ignored if image is set in the platform spec.

volumeType.description: volumeType specifies a volume type to use when creating the root volume. If not specified the default volume type will be used.
